page.title: 11Woodhall Farm Housing Estate
page.content: Woodhall Farm is a large estate on the North-East edge of Hemel Hempstead. The{developers, Fairview,}started building about 10 years ago and have just finished the last phase. There is a mixture of detached, semi-detached and terraced houses and some blocks of flats. 3 or 4 bedroomed houses are the most common. The flats currently sell for about{Â£34,000}and the houses from{Â£43,000.} All the houses have a kitchen and a lounge-diner downstairs and most have 2 toilets. Many houses have been extended and modified. Very few areas had a{gas supply}laid on so they rely on{electricity}for {heating}as well as lighting. Some owners however have converted their heating to{oil or solid fuel,}and a new gas main is being laid round the estate for those who want gas.
